str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Moderately, greatly, exceedingly. Adverb from a derivative of metron; moderately, i.e. Slightly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Perhaps from paio; a boy, or, a girl, and a child; specially, a slave or servant.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
